TopicTitle: I think there is a problem here...

Articles.Content:
If your goal was to orbit Kerbol (the sun), then you are doing it right!

If not, explain what your goal was, then there is a possibility we can provide you with some advice/direct you to some tutorials ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
It looks to me like he was trying to orbit the Mun and got slingshotted into a much larger orbit.

Well, I had this mod that would give me an engine that would take me faster than light, so obviously, the first thing i would do is go to the moon. But according to my picture, i over shot by... infinity....
Once your at the Pe point (Periapsis) turn around and burn your engines to slow down, and wach as the Ap point moves back to match the Mun orbit.

> 
> Well, I had this mod that would give me an engine that would take me faster than light, so obviously, the first thing i would do is go to the moon. But according to my picture, i over shot by... infinity....

FTL travel is not needed for travels within the solar system.

> 
> FTL travel is not needed for travels within the solar system.

Go figure.

Where did you get that? XD

I want it.

also if youre goal is the mun, you might wanna do some retrograde

Fast.

> 
> Where did you get that? XD
> 
> I want it.
> 
> also if youre goal is the mun, you might wanna do some retrograde
> 
> Fast.

Don\'t quote me if im wrong, but I think it\'s called FLT Mod.
When i searched flt mod, the only thing that came up was youre post ;P

> 
> When i searched flt mod, the only thing that came up was youre post ;P

Im sure If you look around the add-ons forum, you find it.

its called FTL

Faster Than Light

[I\'m guessing that this 'FTL' mod is what is meant?](http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=4762.msg167549)

Looks like an engine and fuel tank combo. Combined, you get an Isp above 47 km/s. (Mainly because of the fuel tank)

> 
> [I\'m guessing that this 'FTL' mod is what is meant?](http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=4762.msg167549)
> 
> Looks like an engine and fuel tank combo. Combined, you get an Isp above 47 km/s. (Mainly because of the fuel tank)

thanks 8)
